BFM¶

BFM Configuration Record t_sbi_bfm_config¶

Record element

Type

C_SBI_BFM_CONFIG_DEFAULT

max_wait_cycles

integer

10

max_wait_cycles_severity

t_alert_level

FAILURE

use_fixed_wait_cycles_read

boolean

false

fixed_wait_cycles_read

natural

0

clock_period

time

-1 ns
